titleStmt.title: The case of Mr. Jonas Proast
titleStmt.author: Finch, Leopold William, 1663?-1702.

notesStmt.note: "The defense of Finch, warden of All Souls College, Oxford, against the charges of Proast, former chaplain of the college, that Proast had been unjustly removed from his post"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
